healthTips: Drink at least 8 glasses of water every day.
Eat a variety of fruits and vegetables daily.
Exercise for at least 30 minutes most days of the week.
Get 7 to 8 hours of quality sleep each night.
Limit sugar and processed food intake.
Take short breaks if sitting for long periods.
Avoid smoking and limit alcohol consumption.
Practice stress management techniques like meditation or deep breathing.
Protect your skin from excessive sun exposure.
Stay socially connected with friends and family.
Limit screen time, especially before bed.
Maintain proper posture while sitting or standing.
